snippet: A new report paints a distressing portrait of an agency buried helplessly in paperwork.
abstract: Editorial calls attention to report based on previously unreleased data from Department of Veterans Affairs, which paints distressing portrait of agency buried in paperwork and with a claims backlogs that has gotten far worse over four years; expresses hope that agency's situation will be addressed and cleared up at upcoming meeting in Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
lead_paragraph: A new report paints a distressing portrait of an agency buried helplessly in paperwork.

headline.seo: The Grim Backlog at Veterans Affairs
headline.main: The Grim Backlog at Veterans Affairs
headline.print_headline: The Grim Backlog at Veterans Affairs
